problem_names:
lemma coplanar_4 :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3" and "rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2" 
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3"

lemma desargues_config_3D_coplanar_4 :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3" and "rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3"

lemma coplanar_4_bis :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3" and "rk {A, C, \<beta>} = 2"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3"

lemma desargues_config_3D_coplanar_4_bis :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3" and "rk {A', B', C', \<beta>} = 3"

lemma coplanar_4_ter :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3" and "rk {A, B, \<gamma>} = 2"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<gamma>} = 3"

lemma desargues_config_3D_coplanar_4_ter :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<gamma>} = 3" and "rk {A', B', C', \<gamma>} = 3"

lemma coplanar_5 :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3" and "rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2" and "rk {A, C, \<beta>} = 2"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3"

lemma desargues_config_3D_coplanar_5 :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3" and "rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3"

lemma coplanar_5_bis :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3" and "rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2" and "rk {A, B, \<gamma>} = 2"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<gamma>} = 3"

lemma desargues_config_3D_coplanar_5_bis :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<gamma>} = 3" and "rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<gamma>} = 3"

lemma coplanar_6 :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3" and "rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2" and "rk {A, B, \<gamma>} = 2" and "rk {A, C, \<beta>} = 2"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} = 3"

lemma desargues_config_3D_coplanar_6 :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} = 3" and "rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} = 3"

lemma desargues_config_3D_non_coplanar :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<ge> 4"

theorem desargues_3D :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2"
translations:
lemma coplanar_4 :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3" and "rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2" 
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
have f1:"rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} \<ge> 3"
using matroid_ax_2
by (metis assms(1) empty_subsetI insert_mono)

proof (state)
this:
  3 \<le> rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
have "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} + rk {B, C} \<le> rk {A, B, C} + rk {B, C, \<alpha>}"
using matroid_ax_3_alt

by (metis Un_insert_right add_One_commute add_mono assms(1) assms(2) matroid_ax_2_alt 
        nat_1_add_1 numeral_plus_one rk_singleton semiring_norm(3) sup_bot.right_neutral)
then
have f2:"rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} \<le> 3"

by (metis Un_insert_right add_One_commute assms(2) matroid_ax_2_alt numeral_plus_one 
        semiring_norm(3) sup_bot.right_neutral)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} \<le> 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
from f1 and f2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  3 \<le> rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>}
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} \<le> 3
show "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma desargues_config_3D_coplanar_4 :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3" and "rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3 &&& rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3
proof-

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
 2. rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3
show "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
using assms desargues_config_3D_def[of A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>] coplanar_4

proof (prove)
using this:
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma> \<equiv>
  rk {A, B, C} = 3 \<and>
  rk {A', B', C'} = 3 \<and>
  rk {A, A', P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {B, B', P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {C, C', P} = 2 \<and>
  4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, A', B', C'} \<and>
  rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {B', C', \<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A, C, \<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A', C', \<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A, B, \<gamma>} = 2 \<and> rk {A', B', \<gamma>} = 2
  \<lbrakk>rk {?A, ?B, ?C} = 3; rk {?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3
show "rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3
using assms desargues_config_3D_def[of A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>] coplanar_4

proof (prove)
using this:
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma> \<equiv>
  rk {A, B, C} = 3 \<and>
  rk {A', B', C'} = 3 \<and>
  rk {A, A', P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {B, B', P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {C, C', P} = 2 \<and>
  4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, A', B', C'} \<and>
  rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {B', C', \<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A, C, \<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A', C', \<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A, B, \<gamma>} = 2 \<and> rk {A', B', \<gamma>} = 2
  \<lbrakk>rk {?A, ?B, ?C} = 3; rk {?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>} = 3

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma coplanar_5 :
  assumes "rk {A, B, C} = 3" and "rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2" and "rk {A, C, \<beta>} = 2"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
have f1:"rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
using coplanar_4

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>rk {?A, ?B, ?C} = 3; rk {?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3

by (smt One_nat_def Un_assoc Un_commute add.commute add_Suc_right assms(1) assms(2) insert_is_Un 
        le_antisym matroid_ax_2_alt numeral_2_eq_2 numeral_3_eq_3 one_add_one)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
have f2:"rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3
using coplanar_4_bis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>rk {?A, ?B, ?C} = 3; rk {?A, ?C, ?\<beta>} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?\<beta>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3

by (smt One_nat_def Un_assoc Un_commute add.commute add_Suc_right assms(1) assms(3) insert_is_Un 
        le_antisym matroid_ax_2_alt numeral_2_eq_2 numeral_3_eq_3 one_add_one)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
from f1 and f2

proof (chain)
picking this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
  rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3
show "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3"

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
  rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
using matroid_ax_3_alt'

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>} = 3
  rk {A, B, C, \<beta>} = 3
  rk (?X \<union> {?y}) = rk (?X \<union> {?z}) \<longrightarrow>
  rk (?X \<union> {?z}) = rk ?X \<longrightarrow>
  rk ?X = rk (?X \<union> {?y, ?z})

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
by (metis Un_assoc assms(1) insert_is_Un)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma desargues_config_3D_coplanar_5 :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3" and "rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3 &&&
    rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
proof-

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
 2. rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
show "rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
using assms desargues_config_3D_def coplanar_5

proof (prove)
using this:
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>
  desargues_config_3D ?A ?B ?C ?A' ?B' ?C' ?P ?\<alpha> ?\<beta>
   ?\<gamma> \<equiv>
  rk {?A, ?B, ?C} = 3 \<and>
  rk {?A', ?B', ?C'} = 3 \<and>
  rk {?A, ?A', ?P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?B, ?B', ?P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?C, ?C', ?P} = 2 \<and>
  4 \<le> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?A', ?B', ?C'} \<and>
  rk {?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?B', ?C', ?\<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?A, ?C, ?\<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?A', ?C', ?\<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?A, ?B, ?\<gamma>} = 2 \<and> rk {?A', ?B', ?\<gamma>} = 2
  \<lbrakk>rk {?A, ?B, ?C} = 3; rk {?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 2;
   rk {?A, ?C, ?\<beta>} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>, ?\<beta>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
show "rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
using assms desargues_config_3D_def coplanar_5

proof (prove)
using this:
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>
  desargues_config_3D ?A ?B ?C ?A' ?B' ?C' ?P ?\<alpha> ?\<beta>
   ?\<gamma> \<equiv>
  rk {?A, ?B, ?C} = 3 \<and>
  rk {?A', ?B', ?C'} = 3 \<and>
  rk {?A, ?A', ?P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?B, ?B', ?P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?C, ?C', ?P} = 2 \<and>
  4 \<le> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?A', ?B', ?C'} \<and>
  rk {?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?B', ?C', ?\<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?A, ?C, ?\<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?A', ?C', ?\<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {?A, ?B, ?\<gamma>} = 2 \<and> rk {?A', ?B', ?\<gamma>} = 2
  \<lbrakk>rk {?A, ?B, ?C} = 3; rk {?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>} = 2;
   rk {?A, ?C, ?\<beta>} = 2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>, ?\<beta>} = 3

 1. rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3
by auto

this:
  rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>} = 3

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma desargues_config_3D_non_coplanar :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<ge> 4"
proof-
have "rk {A, B, C, A', B', C'} \<le> rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}"
using matroid_ax_2
by auto
thus "4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}"
using matroid_ax_2 assms desargues_config_3D_def[of A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>]

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {A, B, C, A', B', C'}
  \<le> rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}
  ?X \<subseteq> ?Y \<longrightarrow> rk ?X \<le> rk ?Y
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma> \<equiv>
  rk {A, B, C} = 3 \<and>
  rk {A', B', C'} = 3 \<and>
  rk {A, A', P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {B, B', P} = 2 \<and>
  rk {C, C', P} = 2 \<and>
  4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, A', B', C'} \<and>
  rk {B, C, \<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {B', C', \<alpha>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A, C, \<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A', C', \<beta>} = 2 \<and>
  rk {A, B, \<gamma>} = 2 \<and> rk {A', B', \<gamma>} = 2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}
by linarith

proof (state)
this:
  4 \<le> rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

theorem desargues_3D :
  assumes "desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>"
  shows "rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2
have "rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} + rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} + rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}"
using matroid_ax_3_alt[of "{\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}" "{A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}" "{A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}"]
by (simp add: insert_commute)

proof (state)
this:
  rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} +
  rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}
  \<le> rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} +
        rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2
then
have "rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} + rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} - rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}"
by linarith

proof (state)
this:
  rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}
  \<le> rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} +
        rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} -
        rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2
thus "rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2"
using assms desargues_config_3D_coplanar_6 desargues_config_3D_non_coplanar

proof (prove)
using this:
  rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}
  \<le> rk {A, B, C, \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} +
        rk {A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} -
        rk {A, B, C, A', B', C', \<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>}
  desargues_config_3D A B C A' B' C' P \<alpha> \<beta> \<gamma>
  desargues_config_3D ?A ?B ?C ?A' ?B' ?C' ?P ?\<alpha> ?\<beta>
   ?\<gamma> \<Longrightarrow>
  rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?\<alpha>, ?\<beta>, ?\<gamma>} = 3
  desargues_config_3D ?A ?B ?C ?A' ?B' ?C' ?P ?\<alpha> ?\<beta>
   ?\<gamma> \<Longrightarrow>
  rk {?A', ?B', ?C', ?\<alpha>, ?\<beta>, ?\<gamma>} = 3
  desargues_config_3D ?A ?B ?C ?A' ?B' ?C' ?P ?\<alpha> ?\<beta>
   ?\<gamma> \<Longrightarrow>
  4 \<le> rk {?A, ?B, ?C, ?A', ?B', ?C', ?\<alpha>, ?\<beta>, ?\<gamma>}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2
by fastforce

proof (state)
this:
  rk {\<alpha>, \<beta>, \<gamma>} \<le> 2

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
